TEXT.TITLE: GORDON JEWELRY <GOR> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Gordon Jewelry Corp said it has completed the previously-announced sale of the assets of its catalog showroom stores to privately-held Carlisle Capital Corp for an undisclosed amount of cash and notes in excess of book value. Reuter
